argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatrhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatrhmval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatrhmval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatrhmval.t | |- .* = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatrhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) |
| 6 |  | scmatrhmval.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ x e. K ) -> x e. K ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 10 | 2, 8, 1, 9, 6 | #P_scmatid | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` A ) e. C ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> .1. e. C ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ x e. K ) -> .1. e. C ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ x e. K ) -> ( x e. K /\ .1. e. C ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 6, 4 | #P_smatvscl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( x e. K /\ .1. e. C ) ) -> ( x .* .1. ) e. C ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ x e. K ) -> ( x .* .1. ) e. C ) |
| 16 | 15, 5 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K --> C ) |
